title: The Neophytes Address Untimely Questions, Like Whether Lobbyists Are in League with the Forces of Darkness
preview: To be honest, we did speak about Greenland, but our conversation was uninformed even by our standards, so the topics du this jour are impeachment and lobbyists
body:

To be honest, we did speak about Greenland, but our conversation was uninformed even by our standards, so the topics du this jour are impeachment and lobbyistsâ€”we will return to Greenland sometime around when the Cuban government is toppled (which, apparently, could be soon?).
